content:
WindowState Enum

Definition

Specifies whether a window is minimized, maximized, or restored. Used by the stem.Windows.Window.WindowState* property.

In this Article

public enum WindowState
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
WindowState

Fields

Maximized

The window is maximized.
Minimized

The window is minimized.
Normal

The window is restored.
